Job Purpose


	The Marketing Operations Executive will support the efficient execution of marketing initiatives by managing workflows, campaign tracking, vendor coordination, and budget control.
	The ideal candidate is detail-oriented, organized, and skilled in optimising marketing processes to enhance overall effectiveness within the manufacturing industry.


Key Responsibilities


	Support the planning and execution of marketing campaigns across ATL, BTL, and digital channels
	Maintain and regularly update the integrated marketing calendar
	Manage vendor contracts, purchase orders, and procurement processes
	Coordinate with cross-functional teams to ensure timely campaign execution
	Track and analyze campaign performance, providing regular dashboards and reports
	Monitor and manage the marketing budget in line with financial policies.
	Optimize the use of marketing automation tools, CRM systems, and reporting platforms
	Ensure compliance with industry regulations and brand guidelines in all marketing activities

	Timely, error-free campaign execution
	Budget accuracy and efficient spend management
	On-time delivery of reports and dashboards
	Streamlined processes with fewer bottlenecks
	High satisfaction levels among internal and external stakeholders

	HND / Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field
	2 &ndash; 5 years of experience in marketing operations, project management, or campaign coordination
	Strong organizational, analytical, and process management skills
	Proficiency in Excel, Power BI, CRM systems, and marketing automation tools
	Detail-oriented, with excellent communication and multitasking abilities
	Experience in or exposure to the manufacturing industry is a strong advantage.


Salary
N550,000 - N600,000 Monthly

        Ascentech Services Limited is a full-fledged Human Resource Solution Provider incorporated in 2013 with its Head Office in Lagos, Nigeria. We are committed to forging long-term partnerships with our clients by creating and delivering robust and flexible services that address the changing needs of their business.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Marketing Operations Executive
Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time
Industry: Manufacturing
Reporting To: Head of Marketing

Job Purpose

	The Marketing Operations Executive will support the efficient execution of marketing initiatives by managing workflows, campaign tracking, vendor coordination, and budget control.
	The ideal candidate is detail-oriented, organized, and skilled in optimising marketing processes to enhance overall effectiveness within the manufacturing industry.


Key Responsibilities


	Support the planning and execution of marketing campaigns across ATL, BTL, and digital channels
	Maintain and regularly update the integrated marketing calendar
	Manage vendor contracts, purchase orders, and procurement processes
	Coordinate with cross-functional teams to ensure timely campaign execution
	Track and analyze campaign performance, providing regular dashboards and reports
	Monitor and manage the marketing budget in line with financial policies.
	Optimize the use of marketing automation tools, CRM systems, and reporting platforms
	Ensure compliance with industry regulations and brand guidelines in all marketing activities


Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)


	Timely, error-free campaign execution
	Budget accuracy and efficient spend management
	On-time delivery of reports and dashboards
	Streamlined processes with fewer bottlenecks
	High satisfaction levels among internal and external stakeholders

	HND / Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field
	2 – 5 years of experience in marketing operations, project management, or campaign coordination
	Strong organizational, analytical, and process management skills
	Proficiency in Excel, Power BI, CRM systems, and marketing automation tools

	Experience in or exposure to the manufacturing industry is a strong advantage.

N550,000 - N600,000 Monthly

We pride ourselves on providing exceptional customer service in a welcoming, modern, and hygienic environment. At Lauvee, we value teamwork, innovation, and continuous growth, making it a great place for both clients and staff to thrive.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Personal Assistant

Job Location: Wuse 2, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time

Description

	We are looking for a proactive and highly organized Personal Assistant to support the daily administrative and operational needs of Lauvee Beauty Salon’s management.
	The ideal candidate will be resourceful, detail-oriented, and able to handle confidential information with discretion.


Responsibilities


	Manage schedules, appointments, and meetings.
	Handle correspondence, calls, and messages efficiently.
	Maintain records and assist with daily salon administration.
	Coordinate tasks, follow up on projects, and support team communication.
	Run errands and manage day-to-day personal and business tasks.


Requirements


	OND / HND / B.Sc. in Business Administration, Secretarial Studies, or related field.
	Minimum of 2 years of experience as a Personal Assistant or Administrative Officer.
	Strong organizational and multitasking abilities.
	Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
	Tech-savvy with proficiency in Microsoft Office and Google Workspace.
	Discretion, professionalism, and attention to detail.


Method of Application

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Architect",
  "description": "Eco Home Solutions Limited is a leading provider of high-quality, innovative, and sustainable home furnishing products and services. Established in 2014, with its headquarters in China, the company operates independently through a dedicated professional team based in Guangzhou.

With a strong presence in Africa, particularly in Abuja, Nigeria, Eco Home Solutions Limited is committed to delivering eco-friendly, cutting-edge, and durable home solutions tailored to modern living needs. Our focus on sustainability, quality, and innovation ensures that we provide products that enhance comfort, aesthetics, and energy efficiency for residential and commercial spaces.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Architect

Job Location:&nbsp;Abuja (FCT)&nbsp;
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities


	Design and develop architectural drawings and models to support client projects.
	Provide expert guidance on the selection and use of building materials.
	Collaborate with sales and project teams to deliver tailored solutions for customers.
	Ensure all designs comply with Nigerian building codes, safety standards, and sustainability practices.
	Conduct site visits, installations, and client consultations when necessary.
	Prepare proposals, presentations, and technical documents to support business growth.


Requirements
